mapper.select: SELECT m.name merchant_name, m.iconsrc merchant_icon, m.address merchant_address, pe.context pointExchange_context, pe.time pointExchange_time, per.verificationcode record_code FROM pointexchangerecord per,pointexchange pe,merchant m WHERE per.openid=#{openId} AND per.ifused=0 AND per.pointexchangeid=pe.id AND pe.merchantcode=m.code
